108 def verify_token(token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> dict[str, Any] | None:
109     """Verify a JWT token and check its type."""
110     payload = decode_token(token)
111     if payload is None:
112         return None
113 
114     if payload.get("type") != token_type:
115         return None
116 
117     # Check expiration
118     exp = payload.get("exp")
119     if exp is None:
120         return None
121 
122     if datetime.fromtimestamp(exp, tz=timezone.utc) < datetime.now(timezone.utc):
123         return None
124 
125     return payload
